description: Imagine Jerry Seinfeld in his prime. Then double that awareness and have Seinfeld running for 30 years (and be a bit more bizarre). That's who Hitoshi Matsumoto is to the nation of Japan; he's quite simply the most famous comedian who has ever existed.
synopsis: The mad genius behind BIG MAN JAPAN returns to Fantastic Fest with his most crazed work yet, a brain-unraveling comic tale of male self-destruction.
title: R100
